resources.name: Kids Help Phone
resources.description: 24/7 hotline for youth and adults alike.

resources.name: Youthspace.ca
resources.description: Hotline dedicated to Canadian youth. Includes suicide prevention, education, and support. Active from 6pm to 12am PT.

resources.name: The Lifeline App
resources.description: Direct access to phone, online chat, text, and email crisis support, including e-counselling, self-management tools, and access to crisis centres across Canada.

resources.name: Big White Wall Canada
resources.description: Anonymous peer support community accessible anytime, anywhere.

crisis.name: Crisis Services Canada
crisis.description: National crisis hotline. Phone hotline available 24/7, text support available 4pm to 12am ET.
